techmeme.title: xAI launches an API for Grok 3 and Grok 3 mini with "reasoning" capabilities; Grok 3 costs $3/$15 per million input/output tokens, Grok 3 mini costs $0.30/$0.50 (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
A look at Isomorphic Labs, a life sciences startup spun out of Google DeepMind aiming to "solve all disease" through AI-powered drug discovery (Hayden Field/CNBC)

Court document: NSO Group's spyware Pegasus was used to target 1,223 WhatsApp users in 51 countries in a 2019 attack; Mexico led with 456 victims, India had 100 (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
Google introduces Firebase Studio, an AI-powered platform that lets users create custom mobile and web apps, APIs, backends, and frontends from their browser (Taryn Plumb/VentureBeat)
Autonomous driving startup Wayve will install its Level 2 advanced driver assistance software in Nissan's vehicles from 2027, its first global carmaker deal (Financial Times)
